name: Dark and Bright (itch)
description:
An RPG-puzzle hybrid with focus on story. Unveil an emotional tale about dark and bright times!

Grouchweasel is lost in a life he doesn't desire, but cannot escape. Nothing is unusual. Nothing is spectacular. He feels himself stagnating, becoming a mere vessel of emotions he is forced to contain.  
When he realizes he can't go on like this any longer, he is tossed into a realm of dreams and reality. Or was this reality all this time? Grouchweasel must find out soon, however, because his stay may be cut perilously short. In this alien world, Grouchweasel will embark on the journey of his life. Everything is unusual. Everything is spectacular. And nothing is right!

List of Features
  • Hand-drawn worlds await you in this indie offering!
  • Explore 15 different levels on your journey through the unknown
  • Switch between four different characters, each with a unique skill
  • Use the abilities of these four friends to overcome obstacles
  • Improve and level up your characters
  • Fight enemies with an action battle system
  • Master your fighting skills with optional paths in the game
  • Play on Normal, Challenging or Difficult
Gameplay

RPG, action, skill and puzzle - Dark and Bright combines several genres. Each level must be navigated and cleared to continue Grouchweasel's journey for the truth. Within these levels, the player must collect certain magic orbs, and avoid touching enemies. An elegantly simple action battle system, as well as four playable characters with special abilities, makes this RPG a whole different experience!
